\caption{Double differential cross-section ${\d^2\sigma}/{\d\Omega\d E_3}$ in $ep$ scattering
plotted as a function of the hadronic invariant mass $W$.
Data reprinted with permission from
E.~D. Bloom {\em et~al.}, ``High-energy inelastic $e\ensuremath{-}p$ scattering
  at 6 and 10 deg,'' {\em Phys. Rev. Lett.}, vol.~23, pp.~930--934, Oct 1969.}
\end{center}
\end{figure}
